name: Paragon Backup File
summary: Learn about .PBF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In addition to system backups, PBF files are often used for migrating Windows file systems between versions of Windows operating systems.

description: Backup archive created by one of Paragon's backup and recovery applications; stores backup files in a proprietary format; can be browsed within the software, which enables users to restore individual files or a whole file system.
